section.name: Anonymous Access
section.p:
This project's CVS repository can be checked out through anonymous (pserver) CVS with the following instruction set. When prompted for a password for anonymous, simply press the Enter key.
cvs -d:pserver:anonymous@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/xpetstore login
cvs -z3 -d:pserver:anonymous@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/xpetstore/ co xpetstore

section.name: Developer Access via SSH
section.p:
Only project developers can access the CVS tree via this method. SSH1 must be installed on your client machine.
export CVS_RSH=ssh
cvs -z3 -d:ext:developername@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/xpetstore co xpetstore
